product_name: The North Face TKA 100 Stripe Glacier Quarter-Zip Pullover - Men's
long_description: Cozy up with the classic TKA 100 Stripe Glacier Quarter-Zip pullover from The North Face. Polartec(R) 100 fleece offers warmth without weight, dries quickly and continues to insulate when wet. Unzip the neck to ventilate when needed.
short_description: Cozy up with the classic TKA 100 Stripe Glacier Quarter-Zip pullover from The North Face. Polartec(R) 100 fleece offers warmth without weight, dries quickly and continues to insulate when wet.
